meanings.definition: To need or demand something as necessary.
meanings.sent1: Finishing the puzzle requires patience and focus.
meanings.sent2: Studying for the test requires dedication and hard work.
meanings.sent3: Eating ice cream requires a spoon, not chopsticks!
meanings.sent4: Winning the race requires determination and perseverance.
meanings.sent5: Surviving in the wild requires resourcefulness and adaptability.

meanings.definition: To make necessary; compel or obligate.
meanings.sent1: The new law requires all citizens to wear seat belts.
meanings.sent2: The job promotion requires additional training and skills.
meanings.sent3: The magic spell requires a sprinkle of fairy dust for full effect.
meanings.sent4: The secret mission requires stealth and precision to succeed.
meanings.sent5: The recipe requires fresh ingredients for the best taste.
